name: Stickman fights X [DEMO]
description:
WARNING: THE x32 BIT VERSION IS REALLY BROKEN. RUN AT YOUR OWN COST!!!!! also, no music yet

YT: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCadEWq_aCTBqD05iGgZfhiQ

Welcome to Stickmi-Stickman fights X (sorry for "voice crack"). This is a game inspired by: 

Dani's off the sticks (never got released),

Stick fight the game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/674940/Stick_Fight_The_Game/ (no, there will not be multiplayer),

and last, my 4th-grade comic series called stickman fights. This will go off the story of that comic and yes, soon I might make a prequel game soon.

Well, hope you enjoy it, and below will be controls of the game:

WASD/arrow keys to move.

Space to jump.

Hold left click to pick up items

Right-click to shoot (if carrying a gun)

Peace, -Twingamerdudes
